newsitem.title: UK: Lloyd's re-elects David Rowland as chairman.
newsitem.headline: Lloyd's re-elects David Rowland as chairman.

text.p: The Lloyd's of London insurance market said its Council re-elected Sir David Rowland as chairman for 1997.
John Charman was re-elected as a deputy chairman while Ian Agnew was elected a deputy chairman to replace John Stace who completed his term as a council member at the end of 1996.

Rowland has been Lloyd's first full-time paid chairman since the beginning of 1993 and was the architect of the market's reconstruction and renewal programme which was completed in September last year. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717.
